ComicInfo.Title: The Mega-Monsters from Beyond! Part II: Triax
ComicInfo.Summary: The Mega-Monsters from Beyond! Part II: Triax: The Megan aliens have sent three monsters, Triax, Krollar and Rhiahn to Earth to battle Godzilla and Red Ronin.
